summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 、 和 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML , , and elements on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类在网页上创建按钮控件。Use the class to create button controls on a Web page. `` HTML 元素是在单击时无默认行为的 "推送" 按钮。An `` HTML element is a push button with no default behavior when clicked. `` HTML 元素是在单击时提交窗体的按钮。An `` HTML element is a button that submits a form when clicked. 当单击时，`` HTML 按钮会将所有控件重置为其初始值。An `` HTML button resets all controls to their initial values when clicked. 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中，使用 类和 类分别创建 "重置" 和 "提交" 按钮。In ASP.NET 2.0, use the class and the class to create Reset and Submit buttons, respectively. 有关 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件创建命令按钮、"提交" 按钮和 "重置" 按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a command button, a Submit button, and a Reset button. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton/cs/htmlinputbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton/vb/htmlinputbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`type` 参数的值。The value of the `type` parameter.| 下表显示 `type` 参数的不同可能的值。The following table shows the different possible values for the `type` parameter. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`button`|命令按钮。A command button.| |`submit`|向服务器提交窗体的按钮。A button that submits the form to the server.| |`reset`|用于清除窗体的按钮。A button that clears the form.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用重载构造函数创建 控件的新实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control using the overloaded constructor. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，单击 控件时，将执行页验证。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 使用 属性单击 控件时，可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要防止执行验证，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常用于 事件的事件处理程序中，以防止在单击 "取消" 或 "重置" 按钮时进行页验证。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性阻止页验证发生。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意， 方法独立激活每个验证控件。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation/CS/htmlinputbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation/VB/htmlinputbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使您可以直接处理该事件。

span.span: This allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > "重置" 按钮不会引发 事件。A Reset button does not raise the event. 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 此事件处理程序将在页面上添加两个文本框的值并显示结果。The event handler adds the values of the two text boxes on the page and displays the results. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/CS/htmlinputbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/VB/htmlinputbuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/CS/htmlinputbuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/VB/htmlinputbuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将使用 方法来引发 事件。The method is used by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event. 如果 `true` 属性，则使用 属性中指定的控件组调用 方法。If the property is `true`, the method is called using the group of controls specified in the property. 此方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将重写基 方法。The method overrides the base .method. 主要由控件开发人员使用。 is used primarily by control developers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的 方法，以便始终为 显示特定标题文本（可作为工具提示进行访问）。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific title text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributes.vb#2)]

summary.span: 当在网页上单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an control is clicked on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发此事件。This event is raised when an control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > "重置" 按钮不会引发 事件。A Reset button does not raise the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 此事件处理程序将在页面上添加两个文本框的值并显示结果。The event handler adds the values of the two text boxes on the page and displays the results. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/CS/htmlinputbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/VB/htmlinputbuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/CS/htmlinputbuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/VB/htmlinputbuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性可指定 控件回发到服务器时所导致验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当 属性的值设置为 `true`时，此属性才有效。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为 属性指定值，则当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值，并且 属性设置为 `true`，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定 控件回发到服务器时要验证的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 此页包含两个文本框，用于捕获用户的数据和两个 控件，以确保用户不会将文本框留空。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 第一个文本框的 控件位于 `CityInfoGroup` 验证组中，第二个框的 控件位于 `StateInfoGroup` 验证组中。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 单击 `CityQueryButton` 后，只验证 `CityInfoGroup` 验证组中的控件。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 单击 `StateQueryButton` 后，只验证 `StateInfoGroup` 验证组中的控件。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup/CS/htmlinputbuttonvalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup/VB/htmlinputbuttonvalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Introduction to the Validation Controls
